website_summaries.verdict: This iconic rain boot brand makes products of the highest quality, and this model is no exception. The boots are stylish and functional.
pros: Simple and stylish design, available in a range of colors
Boots provide good traction on slippery surfaces
Tall profile protects against even the largest of puddles
Boots are easily cleaned with damp rag
Stellar quality makes these boots long-lasting
cons: Tall leg profile may be tight or hard to slip over athletic-sized calves

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed since my girls were excited to give them to ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls saved their money and bought these boots before they left for college to give to me for Christmas. Unfortunately, the calves are so tight. I can not wear them. I did not want to get their money back, just exchange them for the extended calf boot. This company will not do it! They will not be out of money - just an exchange. Very disappointed since my girls were excited to give them to me. We will not order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: nicole cotta

customer_reviews.title: They don't even match
customer_reviews.text: Look at all those marks. That's not how new $150 Hunter boots look like. Returning of course.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted the reviews. I have never had issues with boots fitting me before. All my other boots (leather) from a variety of brands have fit beautifully with no issues of narrow-ness or tightness on the calf. These boots fit okay in the foot area but after that it was wicked tight everywhere else. I'm really bummed because I love the color and the look of the boot. I had to return the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Hunter Wellingtons
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the matte navy and love them. They are a very dark navy, but they don't look black. My usual size is 10 and a 1/2, and I ordered the size 10 which fit perfectly wirh thick boot socks and are very comfortable. No slipping or shifting, and the sturdy heel keeps your foot at the perfect angle. I have very slim calves at 5'9" and 145 pounds, and the tops gapped slightly, so I tuck some knit boot toppers around the shaft top for a good look and a perfect fit. My feet and jeans stay bone dry in mud and standing water, and you only need to hose them off.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Angel

customer_reviews.title: Too small, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I consistently wear an 11.5 in everything. Bought these boots in size 12, so I could fit some thick socks. Nope....WAYYYYYY too small. Couldn’t even get my toes past the ankle. I felt like I was trying to put on my kids shoes. My advice? If you are a man, do not buy under any circumstances. I ended up buying some lacrosse boots that fit perfectly. Let these fake field boots die on the vine.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL J KENTES

customer_reviews.title: They bend way too much around calf/ankle area
customer_reviews.text: The boots are cute looking but terrible for function. They bend a lot when walking which becomes annoying because they are so BULKY and also where the height is on them they continuously get caught on seat while accelerating while driving, so definitely do not recommend driving with them. I'm disappointed, I thought they'd be worth it but I ended up finding chooka boots at Nordstrom for half the price and twice the comfort
customer_reviews.author: A. Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Hot Pink Hunter Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I ordered the hot pink boots, got it in 3 days and I don't even have Prime. I know these are rain boots but I wanted to put these boots to the test. I received them yesterday and where I live it was snowing (I got 8 inches of snow). I put these on and walked in the snow. These boots are great for snow weather too. They fit well, but you do need thick socks to keep your feet warm. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 272piscis

customer_reviews.title: My feet got wet.
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots until my feet got wet after I was in a deep paddle. I was not expecting that, i wish i had purchased directly from the Hunter website. I’m not sure if these boots were defective hence the discount.
customer_reviews.author: GKnox

customer_reviews.title: So flexible and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots - I am usually a firm 9.5 but ordered a 9 after reading other reviews. They fit perfect. I love them for walks with the dogs in wet weather or when it’s a little cool. I’ve worn them for a couple miles at a time with no comfort complaints. I have a wider foot, so I figured they might not be so comfy, but these were worth the money. They aren’t super still like cheaper versions I’ve gotten. If they don’t hold up for a several seasons I’d be surprised, but we’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: J Water

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought men’s size 11 and the seller sent women’s size 11. Seller sent email stating that these boots are unisex. No, they are not. The packaging states they are women’s boots, the boots look like women’s boots, and the Hunter website differentiate men’s and women’s boots. These women’s size 11 boots certainly do not fit my man’s size 11 foot. To make matters worse, one can only return these using DHL. Good luck finding a DHL that has hours compatible with a working schedule. My wife wears Hunter boots and she loves them. Too bad these are too big for her. Nice boots, crappy seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sized down, you’re getting knee highs btw
customer_reviews.text: These boots really do feel like quality. I could see how for some people the knee highs would be crunching into your knee cap when you walk but I don’t get bothered by it. I’m 5’5” female and 125lbs. I typically wear size 8.5 or 9 or a euro size 39. I went with a size 8 and these are good for me. They are roomy but not LOOSE. I think this is a good fit for rain boots, to be comfortable with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine
customer_reviews.text: While these boots look well made and fit well, i do not believe they are genuine hunter boots. I had ordered the same style different color directly from hunter the same week and there were definitely differences. The length of the foot was a good inch different. The true hunter ones run large, these fit true to size. The Amazon purchase ones had the hunter logo glued on (you can see glue around these edges odd the logo). These were also made in Indonesia while the others were from China.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these with the socks that go inside, thinking I would use them as winter boots. WRONG. They are not for warmth. I still love them and wear them all the time. They do run a little big. I normally wear a 9 in any shoe and theyre slightly too big, but not enough to return for a smaller size. Very durable, they will last for a long time. Would definitely recommend for a great rain boot. I would definitely consider getting more products from hunter. The high cost is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: sarah rodwell

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too tall and rubbed my knee
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and Amazon notes they were men’s on the checkout page. I went back and double checked and they are women’s. I was delivered women’s boots so seems like an input error on Amazon’s end. These boots are SO cute. I wanted to keep them but unfortunately the top of the boot rubbed on my knee (just walking around the house) and I could tell wearing them more than a few minutes would have given me a blister. If you order the HUNTER boot socks you can probably nix this issue, but I didn’t want to wear them. Overall I like the short HUNTER boots better for comfort. I ordered both. Kept the short, returned the tall.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t buy this product from Amazon! I had purchased them and they cracked in the same place on both boots- the cracks made them no longer water proof! And I need them for barn work. When I contacted Amazon they said they said they couldn’t help me and to contact the seller. Which is NOT Hunter Boot Company. How naive of me - but when I contacted Hunter Boot Company they said Amazon was not an authorized seller. So product diversion plus poor quality means it may not be the same product. Very disappointing. Buy from Hunter Boot Company directly. the additional cost will give you a long lasting, true product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Would give no stars if possible. These boots came used, dirty and with cat hair all over them. In addition, based on my knowledge of Hunter boots they are fake. Flimsy and the molds were way off. Felt and looked cheap. Boots this price I expect new unused and be the real deal. I got fake, dirty and used. Buy at own risk!!
customer_reviews.author: JAFO

customer_reviews.title: Best fit for young adults or bird feet?
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these— I have always wanted a pair of Hunter boots and was looking forward to using these out in the yard but I struggled to get them over my calves, and I don’t have large calves either. I struggled enough and got them on, but they were too large in the foot and still way too tight around my calves. Created a suction seal and took even longer to get off. They went right back in the box and returned. I was disappointed, but now I know they aren’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Blondin

customer_reviews.title: Not Glossy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots this is my second pair. It rains a lot during the spring and I thought a new pair would be great. So I saw these and wanted a different color. I have the high gloss purple ones. I got these and they are John Deere green. no glossiness just matte. I will keep them because they work for the job just not as fashionable as the high gloss purple ones I have. I wear a size 11 in these so the color is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Catinacat

customer_reviews.title: Love hunter boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 but have 2 pairs in the last and I always order size 6 in hunter and they fit well. I am only 5 foot 2 and these are just too high for me. Returning these but love the brand and hope to order a shorter pair in the future. Great quality. Love the blue color too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. They are exactly the color in the photo. I was worried they would be too high on my leg (I'm only 5'5) but they sit nicely under my knee. I'm a size 8 and that's what I got and they are a little big, but not enough to have gotten a smaller size. They were awesome in the rain today and I walked in them for 2 miles and that didn't really bother my bad ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear an 8.5 but I ordered an 8 as recommended per the hunter website. They fit perfect and were half the price that they should be. I highly recommend to splurge on this one. I'm not a box saver, but if you are the box these come in will be damaged during shipping, just an FYI. I love my boots, I wear them mostly in my garden after it's rained or out and about if it's actually raining.
customer_reviews.author: alex e

customer_reviews.title: The most traditional of all gardening boots and easy to take off for once!
customer_reviews.text: Handsome, great below the knee height, comfy and easy to rinse off. I bought sheepskin footbeds and fabric liners for them through Amazon for the cooler weather in the Fall and Spring when toes get nippy out there in the elements and you need the extra water protection and warmth for comfort. Not a must but I know from my old ones I need them here in Vermont for cool weather gardening chores.
customer_reviews.author: CB From VT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter-in-law and she was extremely pleased. I didn't think she would ever wear them as she lives in south Texas and it never rains...but I was wrong. She has sent me pics every time she wears them. She enjoys walking in the woods wearing the boots to keep her ankles safe from the brushy terrain. She wears them to water plants, clean the deck, etc. Today I received a pic as she was heading to work and it actually happened to be raining. She's a happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: ARHOGS

customer_reviews.title: SUPER TALL - hurts back of knee
customer_reviews.text: This issue depends on your foot size vs. height. I have a larger shoe size, 10 but am only 5'6" so this boot is WAY too tall and digs into the back of my knee when climbing stairs or getting in/out of a car. Maybe if you are 5'10" and wear a size 8 shoe, this would not apply. Advise: try on in a store before ordering. Otherwise the foot bed of the shoe has excellent support for a rain boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Buyers be forewarned: if your calf is bigger than 15" around you'll need to get the extended version of this boot. I barely got my leg in without jeans on so I knew that these weren't going to work out. Luckily the company was super accommodating, kept in contact with me during the refund process and refunded me quickly and easily. Great boots, and great quality. Just not for someone with meatier calves.
customer_reviews.author: Isabell

customer_reviews.title: Tight around calves
customer_reviews.text: Very tight in the calf area but bagging at the bottom. I’ve been wanting these boots for a very long time. And I’m really wanting them to work out. I was pregnant when I got them and they were extremely tight around my calves. I am waiting a few weeks to hopefully shed some water weight and try them again. I really hope I do t have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayellbee1

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the boots
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the boots. Overall they fit great BUT I felt they were a tiny bit too snug around my calf. I prefer a boot with a wider opening. I sent these back for that reason. I will probably buy them again only if I can find this color in a "big calf" version. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Semperfiwifey

customer_reviews.title: Size up one at least
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pair for so long, finally got some and even ordered a half size up from what I would normally wear just to be safe, they go on easy but getting them off is like a workout, my whole foot is like it is suctioned into the boot.. Also dont wear them without socks youll get blisters on the back of your heels.
customer_reviews.author: DL86

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting these boots for a few years now and I finally bit the bullet and bought a pair. I bought a different brand of wellies from another retailer and they were too small for my calves so I worried about these, but they fit my legs perfect. They are also easy to get on and off. My favorite part is that the first time I wore them, I only wore simple socks, and I did not get any blisters! They were very comfortable to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: IT NEVER RAINS IN CALIFORNIA
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted yellow rain boots! Got these as a Christmas present seem very durable, great material. I say seem because of course when I finally get what I’ve wanted for years now it’s a bit of a dry spell/only light drizzles T__T I have semi-wide feet and these fit great! Definitely recommend! Doing my best to refrain from buying all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: juzarwizdom7

customer_reviews.title: Drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: The 8 was true to size, with a thick sock it was comfortable. However, I am 5"2 and these are way too high -- if I sit down, the top cuts into the back of my leg. Also the buckle cannot be fastened neatly/securely and doesn't actually tighten it; it would be better without the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit👌
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! The calf width was perfect, and it fell right beneath my knee. The color was spot on. The quality of the interior and exterior of the boot is superb. There is also a good amount of arch support. Definitely worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. The color is a bright red and always cheers me up on a rainy day. I have large calves relative to my shoe size (5.5), so I can't really tuck in my jeans into the boots, which is a shame, but I have that problem with most non-elastic boots. I always look forward to the rain, because I know I can break these babies out for a spin.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great High Quality Boots
customer_reviews.text: My spouse wanted these boots for a holiday gift. They are trendy and they do look pretty cool, and dare I say quite British. They arrived perfectly packaged, in brand new condition, and made my spouse exceedingly happy! I expect that his feet, ankles, and much of his leg will be well protected from rain, and just about everything else wearing these. The price was good and the Hunter quality is of course excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: Boots not quite made for walking
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I'm 5'7" and a size 7 shoe. I'm not sure if it's because my legs are too twig like but the boots make a lot of fwapping sounds when I walk. Literally every step. And on top of that it cuts into my shin if I walk too much. The shape of the boot is very stiff and awkward for the natural leg movement. I think they're super cute and will definitely still wear them in the rain, but they are not made for wearing extended periods of time. At least not for my body type apparently. Also a little pricey for not being wearable for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these... only thing.. they are rather difficult to takeoff! Keep this in mind when purchasing the taller ones . Overall, love!
customer_reviews.author: Bontech

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: These are almost impossible to get on and off. It takes two people, once I get them on they fit perfectly but there is no loop at the back to help You pull them on and the narrow part by the ankle makes them to hard to get off. Wish I hadn’t spent so much on these
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Extravagant but lovely
customer_reviews.text: I laughed at the teens were buying these up 5 years ago but man, they’re cute! I wear them every day now. So comfortable and stylish and practical. I love them. Can’t help myself. A little pricey, but I’m betting the last a lifetime :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these but kind of narrow
customer_reviews.text: The boots are awesome. The only complaint is they are very high and hard to take off. Make sure you have knee high socks or skinny jeans tucked in so they slide off better. Took me forever to take them off when worn with shorts. The ankle area is very narrow but the shoe size itself is true to size. Not sure why the make them so narrow at the ankle. But I do love them and would recommend to buy as long as you have regular to skinny calves. Maybe they have wide width that would allow more room to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rainy day fun
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a pair of Hunter boots for a long time. Finally, I ordered and love them. I got the flat green and they fit true to size. I was so happy to get a rainy day to wear them and thought they did a good job of keeping my feet dry while looking stylish too. I was comfortable in them all day.
customer_reviews.author: BargainBecky

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: The pink is a little darker than I’d thought it would be.. I’m a 6 1/2 -7 and I decided to go with a 7. So glad I did! A 6 would have been too snug with thick socks. So, all in all it’s a very well made boot! The shipping was unbelievably fast! I can’t wait to see how they hold up to our first snow 🤞🏻 🖤
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but too snug on calves
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying these boots are adorable. Unfortunately they have no stretch to them and would not fit comfortably over my calves. I’m a bit on the shorter side and have athletic calves from sports and the are just too snug there.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very tall!
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cute, and loved the color!~ The only thing is that I might have short legs because this goes literally right up to my knee which feels kind of funny. Overall very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with these boots! They are very comfortable and look amazing. I bought one size bigger and although they are big they fit great. I usually wear size 9 but I got a 10 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anto

customer_reviews.title: They fit and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Received my boots today and they are great!! I bought the glossy red in size 6...I wear a 6.5 but the 6 is perfect on these, I have room for socks too.....they fit good in the calf area and come right below my knees I'm 5'3" and weigh 130. Shipping was fast also
customer_reviews.author: Ravans

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and watching the rain/muddy puddles bead up on them. They are a little loose and I have to wear two pairs of socks if wearing normal socks, but they will work great with my thick knit socks in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Much too small, box was severely damaged, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Much too small, box was severely damaged, and the plastic shipping bag it was in was also ripped open. I will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! However, very tricky to take off.
customer_reviews.text: It is embarrassing to try to take these off in front of other people. You definitely need to sit down and put your whole body into it.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and expensive. The calf fit too tight. I returned them. I already had a pair of “joycorn” brand and I prefer them. I was expecting the hunter boots to be better quality and fit better but they weren’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer k.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$ and will have for years to come
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these on Prime day. Have been wanting these for about 1 year, even searched facebook marketplace but they came down in price and had to snatch them. They are extremely comfortable and will be purchasing the inserts for the winter months in SC. I am still trying to figure out how to pack them (they fold up) but will just need to go to the hunter website.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Calf opening is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Calf was much smaller than my last pair. What's going on Hunter? Returned and ordered the adjustabl-back-buckle style: I am happy with those but wondering why these are tighter than previously boots. They still looked great though and the quality was there so I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Keri S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Size down a 1/2 size for a more true fit. I’m usually an 8 1/2 and went with a 8. Perfect fit for thin socks and enough room for thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Nina rudewick

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and they fit comfortably. The only thing is it is very wide on my calves so it flops back and forth which gets a little loud...runs a little large for a size 8. I wish there was a size right in between 7 and 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very shiny boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit large so buy one size down. The finish is too shiny for my taste but if you're into that it looks nice. They do give off a rubbery smell, even after a week in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: Great feet for smaller calves
customer_reviews.text: The boot looked great, but I returned them because they were tall and very straight and my calves didn't leave a lot of clearance around them therefore, I had great difficulty taking them off without assistance. Great looking boot though.
customer_reviews.author: Average Viewer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my Hunter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a pair forever and finally was able to get them. Package arrived today. LOVE them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with this product. I have owned Hunters in the past but something has definitely changed with the manufacture of these boots. They are flimsy and not well made. The attention to detail that you would expect from Hunter is not there. I took a few photos of the boots, even the 'Hunter' logo on the front of the boots is misaligned, making them look like knock-offs. I will be returning these boots ASAP, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MI1980

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are made for adults with child size calves! Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable boot! In-between: size up!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and the description carefully, as well as watched the video to watch a pair of boots being made, to decide if I was going to order these boots. I ordered a 7 and found that my toes were right at the edge of the boot. I returned them and got an 8. I am so glad I bought them! My feet run narrow and these boots fit and still leave room for me to wear thick socks for colder weather and still have room to keep my feet comfortable! I’m ordering for my daughter, too. I was also happy they offer short and tall boots depending on where/if you want the edge to reach the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A classic to keep dry
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase these Hunter boots because my current rain boots seamed too short and stiff. I like The shaft height to keep pants dry because they are easy to tuck pant legs into; skinny or regular. They seem to run a little on the big side. I am usually 8.5 or 9. I ordered a 9 with plenty of room to add thick socks or a fleece liner. Soft rubber for comfort and flex when walking unlike my other pair from a major outdoor retailer. Gave 4 or 5 stars because of the sizing and price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these all day standing at work. I walked a mile in them and then worked all day as a stylist and my feet, legs, and back didn’t hurt at all! I wish I could wear these even when it’s not raining!
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these because I was afraid they were not authentic but they are true Hunter boots. Size down because they do run large. Absolutely beautiful boots. Now I want them in red :)
customer_reviews.author: snn

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love!! I bought the Military Red boots. I feel like each style/color fits different. I tried on a friend's boots that are size 10 and it was a perfect fit, so I bought these in a 10 and they're a little big but not big enough that I'd go down to a 9.
customer_reviews.author: bassetlovr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rain boots!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these boots! They make a great statement :) when it is raining and keep her dry at college. Worth the extra $ for the quality. (She had her last pair of boots for 7 years!! Could not believe they came from the UK so quickly!!! Thank you!!! She is thrilled w/ these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy M.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted!! I was hesitant due to several reviews of poor quality or fit, however I decided to take the chance. Absolutely love!! Great fit and quality. My calves are about 31cm and had fit perfect in the original tall style
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stahlschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Boots
customer_reviews.text: Have always wanted a pair, finally bought these and they are so comfortable! I wear them out riding, running errands and anytime it rains. Super adorable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Hunter boots and they’re comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I used to work for Nordstrom shoes, these really are legit Hunter boots (or at least my matte black ones are). The calves are wide enough to tuck skinny jeans or leggings into with a good sock. They are a little roomy, but that’s good for adding extra thick socks for winter. They’re super comfy and the red Hunter label makes them extra chic. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Teniah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fiancée loves the fit
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping! Got these as a Christmas gift for my fiancée and I can't go anywhere without her wearing these! She loves them more than her tennis shoes. She does tell me they are super comfortable and that she wished she had more outfits to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to take off
customer_reviews.text: The boots are so cute but they are terrible to take off. I literally had to call for help. I couldn’t get them off and I thought I was going to have to cut them open. Luckily after a while of trying and my sons fathers assistance i was able to get them off.
customer_reviews.author: Bellybell

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for the normal calf size. Overall a decent boot, but the fit is just off.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, arrived later than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 9.5 US women's size & size 9 fits great with plenty of room for hunter boot sock inserts. I am 5'4" and the tall boots come to just below my knee, perfect height. Purple color is gorgeous (deep dark purple). Only gave four stars instead of five because boots arrived later than expected, about 3 days after latest stated arrival date when ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool style, awesome color (I got the canary yellow). Waterproof, stylish but very heavy. And I can't drive with them :( But I still like them and I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: Happy of the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The soul is a little longer than I expected but it will be perfect with a good pair of warm socks!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Plenty of room for fluffy socks. I have a very wide foot and these were perfect for me! Calves fit just right over skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a pair of these for so long! They are so beautiful and comfortable. They look great with a pair of jeans and plaid shirt!
customer_reviews.author: J. Trout

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: This boot is supposed to fit to size. And it is jinormous! For My foot.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Thompson

customer_reviews.title: LOVED the boots
customer_reviews.text: LOVED the boots, just as described and came in a timely manner. I'm just too short for these long boots. They hit the back of my knee, when I tried them on. Had to return them. I plan on ordering the shorter pair, once my refund hits. Great looking boot!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Christine D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots, if you have big calves don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color- way to tight for my calves. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Spradley

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots and this was my car the best price I could find on solid black hunter boots! I was a little skeptical because of the price, but I’ve read lots of reviews and articles and you truly get what you pay for. The quality is amazing! They fit perfectly to the description. I’m normally a 7.5, but sized down to a 7 because they “run big” and they fit great! Can’t wait to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Buy the boots!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots. Authentic Hunter. HOWEVER, order down a size! I normally wear an 8.5 and ordered a 9 and had to return them for an 8, which fit perfect! I wear them in rain or snow and absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: MCDel

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Wear them to run errands, camping and into the fields / country . Unique color with a traditional look. Watch bug spray though as it will take color off like a nail polish remover.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, so glad i got it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a trip in rainy weather, and i'm so glad i did! I wear a size 5, it fits but there's still space for my feet to move in them. I'm assuming it's extra wiggle space for thicker socks in winter. Regardless, it's great quality, has some weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear an 8.5 but had read that these run big so I bought the 8. It fits everywhere, foot length, calf width (I had heard it had a narrow shaft) but after I get them on, I have a heck of a time trying to get them off because the ankle shaft is very small. I usually ask my husband to help me take them off, because if that. They are very comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!! I was surprised how large the calf is on this pair.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two other pairs of Hunter wellies and not sure why this pair is so different. The calf is huge and the side buckle is always undone. Now that they are being made in China they are not as good. Wished I returned them before I wore them but they took SO long to arrive that I needed them for an event and had no time to get others.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinebeck, NY

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Shaft with no "give"!!! If you have calves of a field hockey player, these are not for you!!
customer_reviews.text: Not for anyone with larger than average calves. I forced them on and could hardly get them off due to the suction it created. Yikes! Apparently I need the "huntress" for us fuller calf gals 😄 The boots themselves were lovely and great quality just too narrow of a shaft for me. Happens to me all the time with boots. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: For my tall granddaughter/ expensive but fully functional and she loves the color - boat blue - wonderful color.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Hunter boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Hunter boots and wears them all winter. These are true to size and hold up well through almost daily wear
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for super wet PNW winters
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for super wet PNW winters. My only issue is that I can't get my pant leg all the way down into the boot. Other than that, they are comfortable and seem almost indestructible. Great grip in the sole. You could probably run through mud with these suckers on!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They came in a hunter box also. I wear them with every outfit possible! I live in ohio so you never know when you’ll need them. They are comfortable. They seem more like a very light gray than white but everyone else says they’re white when they see them. I’ve gotten many compliments on them. I wear a size 8 and they fit perfectly! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rose

customer_reviews.title: What is not to love
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Hunter boots for probably more than forty years and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Dawn V. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Because I have high arches it's almost impossible to get these boots on and off. It's a real struggle. Once I finally get them on, I need to rest after all the exertion.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boot!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Hunter boots are AMAZING!!! Great sturdy boot for a great value. I won’t buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rhondamk

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife Happy Life...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them and they are really expensive and unnecessary...I think the red is ugly. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: CabernetMountain

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots great color!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots. Just as described & came quickly. Bought as a gift. They were more “true to size” than expected. My mom wears size 6 typically. i bought 5 but was too small. Returned & bought size 6. they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LoRO

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and strong boots! I’m normally an 8.5/9 and the 9 fit perfect. I have flat feet and the support in these is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bischoff

customer_reviews.title: Love my rainboots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots about 3 years ago, and they still look brand new. If you have wide calves, these boots are not for you. The strap is not adjustable. My calves are almost too big.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Williams

customer_reviews.title: These boots are..."meh"
customer_reviews.text: these boots fit fine but i expected them to be more special considering the price. they feel just like boots that you buy from target, century 21 or any other retailer. don't spend 100+ on these boots if you do not care about popular brands. they are just "meh" to me.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted these. Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected!! Great fit. Super comfortable and practical. Love the color. Super warm and easy to clean. A classic. Every girl needs a pair
customer_reviews.author: KAY E BASILE

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: These did not come in the original hunter box or with the drawstring bag or directions.
customer_reviews.author: jenn364

customer_reviews.title: Run very large
customer_reviews.text: Run way large. I wear an 8.5 and got a size 9. It was easily a 9.5. Had to return them. Definitely need to order a smaller size than your normal.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Taylor

product_meta.title: Hunter Women's Original Tall Rain Boot
product_meta.description: First introduced in 1956, the Original Tall boot is handcrafted from 28 parts and built on the original last for exceptional fit and comfort. This iconic style lies at the heart of the Hunter Original British brand. Fully waterproof and functionally led, Hunter also provide an aesthetic, for which the rainboot has developed a global fashion following.
feature_bullets: Note: Select your US size. Please be advised, the product and box will display UK, US and Euro sizing. For US sizing, both men's and women's sizing is displayed. Men's sizing is represented by "M" and women's sizing is represented by "F".
Please note: If your size is unavailable, please check the women's version by typing in this SKU# - 7338173. Hunter sizing has both men's and women's conversions.
Everyone needs this classic style in their wardrobe!

Legendary Hunter fit and comfort. Orthopaedic last. Unique latex dipped construction – provides a seamless waterproof shell, while still strong yet flexible. Woven nylon lining. For fall and winter use, warm socks are recommended. Ideal for walking through wet grass or fields as well as walking in wet conditions in the city. Cushioned footbed for extra comfort. Traditional calendered outsole. Please keep in mind that the buckle on this boot is merely decorative and should not be used as an
